co.cask.coopr.provisioner.plugin
Class ResourceCollection

java.lang.Object
  co.cask.coopr.provisioner.plugin.ResourceCollection

public class ResourceCollection
extends Object

Collection of resources for a specific tenant. This is sent to provisioners to let them know what resources are available for each plugin.
